title: The book of Ruth expounded in twenty eight sermons, by Levves Lauaterus of Tygurine, and by hym published in Latine, and now translated into Englishe by Ephraim Pagitt, a childe of eleuen yeares of age
author: Lavater, Ludwig, 1527-1586.
publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, dwelling without Temple-bar,
